name: PropertyListDecoder
desc: An object that decodes instances of data types from a property list.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new, reusable property list decoder.

items.name: func decode<T>(T.Type, from: Data) -> T
items.desc: Returns a value of the specified type by decoding a property list using the default property list format.

items.name: func decode<T>(T.Type, from: Data, format: inout PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat) -> T
items.desc: Returns a value of the specified type by decoding a property list using the supplied format.

items.name: var userInfo: [CodingUserInfoKey : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary you use to customize decoding by providing contextual information.
